column3: Institute of Business, Industry and Leadership
column5: The focus of this programme is professional transformation which uses transformative learning principles to develop the skills and behaviours necessary to enable career progression at a senior organisational leadership level.COURSE OVERVIEWThis programme was co-created with industrial partners in the nuclear and engineering sector as a direct response to the skills they need from their future senior leaders.Our course aims to broaden and deepen your capabilities, so that as Industrial Leaders you will understand the organisational and leadership behaviours associated with managing sustainable and innovative projects and organisations.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
